normalized: a few hours later.
asuka, who had flown away from the dso japan branch, touched down and stood in the area of high-class villas to which nonomura had been summoned.
because she had soared with all her might, making full use of her wind powers, she arrived faster than the chief, who had gone off first.

name: asuka
normalized: this is asuka, i've arrived on location.
she got in contact with the chief and kotani through a transmission.

name: chief
normalized: 『this is the chief.
asuka, situation on the ground.
a reply came back from the chief, who was still riding in the helicopter, but it was mixed with a considerable amount of noise.
it seemed that electronic jamming was being exerted over this whole area.

name: asuka
normalized: i'm now in the back garden of the villa.
from appearances, it seems safe and tranquil.
i can't confirm asagi's appearance.
there are no signs of other enemies in the surroundings, either.
however, this noise is atrocious.

name: chief
normalized: 『asuka, we also have information that the aforementioned kanda brigade is heading in this direction.
don't let your guard down.

name: asuka
normalized: roger.
asuka replied, and peeked at the situation inside the villa.
somebody was there.
her sense of hearing, which had been mechanically enhanced, caught the sound of a person walking inside.
it seemed like one person.

name: asuka
normalized: asuka here, there's someone inside the villa.
the number: 1.
i will invade, starting now.
this was not the time to lose her presence of mind.
asuka started acting at once.
barinnhh!
she invaded by smashing through the window.
the man who was there raised his head in surprise.

name: nonomura
normalized: you're…?!
the terrorist who attacked the prime minister's residence yesterday?
it was nonomura.
shock spread across his face.

name: asuka
normalized: ah… umm… this is…
yesterday, and then today.
she was wavering about how to explain, when nonomura made a face that seemed self-deprecating.

name: nonomura
normalized: unfortunately, the prime minister has already left this place.
all that's left is me.

name: nonomura
normalized: or, did you come to kill me?
that's amusing.
nonomura said a thing like that with such a calm tone of voice that asuka was bewildered.

name: asuka
normalized: y, you're wrong.
i came to save you.

name: nonomura
normalized: save me?
you?
nonomura said curiously.
that was also a natural reaction, but asuka repeated herself.

name: asuka
normalized: i am a taimanin acting independently.
having gotten wind of your hectic schedule, i came to prevent that.

name: asuka
normalized: nonomura-giin, asagi will be here very soon, receiving instructions from prime minister asai.
you have to escape quickly.

name: nonomura
normalized: hahahahahaha.
nonomura suddenly burst out laughing.

name: asuka
normalized: eh…?

name: nonomura
normalized: i know asagi will come soon.
to kill me――well, to discover my corpse.

name: asuka
normalized: wh, what are you saying…?

name: nonomura
normalized: is that so?
knowing that, you came to save me?
i see, it looks like even the taimanin have splinter groups.
nonomura nodded like he had come to a hasty conclusion.
the meaning wasn't clear to asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: （come to discover his corpse?

name: nonomura
normalized: however, it's impossible for me to escape from this place.
nonomura said flatly.

name: asuka
normalized: i know i'm not trustworthy, but quickly!

name: nonomura
normalized: no, i believe you.
if you want to know why, it's because i know the terror of asai.

name: asuka
normalized: prime minister… asai?
nonomura nodded.

name: nonomura
normalized: asai is a terrifying man.
i climbed to the top this far, but misread that man at the end.

name: nonomura
normalized: asai told me, 『if you want to save the life of your family, die here.
』 with the same face as always.

name: asuka
normalized: wha?!
asuka was lost for words.

name: nonomura
normalized: asagi will come along to find my dead body.
after that, i think it will be as you can imagine.
this means asagi will be accused of the crime of murder, and the taimanin village will be purged.

name: nonomura
normalized: well, something like that is irrelevant to me.
i have to die here, for the sake of my family.
nonomura said so, and produced a handgun from his pocket.

name: asuka
normalized: w, wait!

name: nonomura
normalized: there's no need to save me.
i would decline something like being rescued by a taimanin.
nonomura said, with no doubt in his eyes.
asuka faltered from the strength of those eyes.

name: asuka
normalized: why follow such an absurd instruction?!
there's no guarantee asai won't kill your family!

name: nonomura
normalized: asai has crossed a line.

name: nonomura
normalized: even if i am talked about behind my back as a pro-american pawn, i have waited patiently for this country to someday become a proper independent nation.
i have bet on the revival of this country in my own way.

name: nonomura
normalized: that man intends to sell this country to american misers.
without any hesitation.
without even an “objective”.

name: nonomura
normalized: however, if i fulfill my obligation for that purpose, that man will probably not kill my family.

name: nonomura
normalized: do you understand?
it's because he doesn't have any interest in something like the lives of my family.

name: asuka
normalized: b, but…
asuka faltered.
somehow, even though she wanted to prevent his suicide, no words came out.
no matter what she said, she could not persuade this person.
because she understood that.
regardless of whether it was right or wrong, his experience, profundity and faith as a human were considerably different to hers.
asuka was still just a girl.
nonomura had made eyes at asuka like he was looking at his daughter.

name: nonomura
normalized: he is a frightening man.
you should be careful as well.

name: nonomura
normalized: taimanin, could you tell me your name?

name: asuka
normalized: k, koukawa asuka…

name: nonomura
normalized: koukawa asuka.
i hope you can stop that man's aimless, reckless behaviour…!
daann!
a gunshot sound reverberated.
his head, which he had pressed the barrel of his gun against, burst open.
spinal fluid splattered onto the wall, and his body collapsed, making a loud noise.
a sea of blood was spreading across the floor.
piercing through his own head, nonomura had committed suicide.
asuka could have prevented it by force.
however, she had not been able to.
she did nothing but watch.

name: asuka
normalized: because of this, that man was about to end it all just by himself!
for some reason, kousuke's face came to mind.

name: asuka
normalized: moron!

name: kotani
normalized: 『asuka?!
what's wrong, asuka?!
did something happen?
it seemed he had thought it was strange that there wasn't any communication after invading the villa.
a transmission came in from kotani.

name: kotani
normalized: 『asuka, are you all right?!
report on your present condition, asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: asuka here, i'm fine.

name: asuka
normalized: nonomura has been killed.
report over.
asuka said that alone, and cut the transmission.
she kept standing still in front of nonomura's corpse, dumbfounded.
then, a few minutes later.

name: asagi
normalized: wha?!
she appeared, like nonomura had said.
asagi.
successfully falling into the enemy's trap, she had come along to be made to look like a murderer.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka?!
her voice shook with rage.
asuka glared at asagi and took a defensive posture.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka, what is the meaning of this?!
asagi pointed her sword at asuka.
it was obvious that, seeing the situation, she suspected asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: （it's because she's so…!
her back teeth made a grinding sound.
asagi was always like this.
she didn't understand anything about asuka, or kousuke.
she saw only what she wanted to see.

name: asagi
normalized: i was able to meet with the chief cabinet secretary just now.

name: asagi
normalized: the chief cabinet secretary-dono who said he wanted to meet with me is dead.
asagi exchanged a communication with her superior or someone, still staring at asuka.

name: asagi
normalized: answer.
is this your doing?!
rather than one inquiring about the truth, she had a tone of voice that had prematurely decided that asuka had done it.

name: asuka
normalized: （no matter what i say, it won't get through to this person.
resignation filled asuka's mind.
with that timing, a call came in from kotani.

name: kotani
normalized: 『this is kotani.
asuka, the kanda brigade's taimanin village attack is today.
the siege of the village has already begun!
hearing that, asuka spoke.

name: asuka
normalized: we're all too late.
giving up on asagi, she gave rise to the power of the wind.
she couldn't linger in a place like this.
if she didn't proceed to the village as quickly as possible…

name: asagi
normalized: asuka, wait!
you won't get away this time!

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
asagi, who didn't understand anything, was screaming at her.
then.

name: asuka
normalized: （enemies outside?
dadadadadadadada!
suddenly, they were being shot at from outside.

name: asagi
normalized: tsk!
asagi clicked her tongue as she dove for cover.
asuka deflected all of the bullets with a wall of wind as she, too, got out of the way.
judging from the sound, it seemed to be a 12.
7 mm machine gun.
was it the kanda brigade, which matched the report?

name: asuka
normalized: how irritating.
asuka said absentmindedly, and strengthened her wind power immediately.
the room's furnishings were blown away.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
asuka looked at asagi once more.
her face didn't understand at all why asuka was here, or why she was now under attack in this place.
that was the reality for the strongest taimanin.

name: asuka
normalized: （please fight them as you wish by yourself.
asuka spit out in her mind, and flew out the window, ignoring asagi and the kanda brigade.

name: asuka
normalized: haahh!
fully unleashing her wind power, she soared up into the sky.

name: kotani
normalized: 『asuka, where are you going?!

name: asuka
normalized: that's obvious!

name: kotani
normalized: 『wait!
asuka, turn back!

name: chief
normalized: 『asuka!
stop!

name: asuka
normalized: no!

name: asuka
normalized: i'm going to save kousuke!
the emotions enhanced her taimanin powers.
asuka had transformed into a fierce wind.
heading for the village of the taimanin.
